verses.verse: <S%H1212>"Bezalel<s%> and <S%H171>Oholiab<s%> shall <S%H6213>work<s%> with <S%H2450>every<s%> <S%H3820>wise-hearted<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> in <S%H1992>whom<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H6213>work<s%> all the <S%H6213>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> and <S%H171>Oholiab,<s%> and <S%H2450>every<s%> <S%H3820>wise-hearted<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> in whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> even everyone whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> stirred him <S%H5375>up<s%> to <S%H7126>come<s%> to the <S%H4399>work<s%> to do <S%H6213>it:<s%>

and they <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> all the <S%H8641>offering<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> with which to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H935>it.<s%> They brought yet to him freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%> every <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

All the wise <S%H2450>men,<s%> who <S%H6213>performed<s%> all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from his <S%H4399>work<s%> which they <S%H6213>did.<s%>

They <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> much <S%H7235>more<s%> than <S%H1767>enough<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>make.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> gave <S%H6680>commandment,<s%> and they caused it to be <S%H6963>proclaimed<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let neither <S%H376>man<s%> nor <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4399>anything<s%> else for the <S%H8641>offering<s%> for the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>" So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3607>restrained<s%> from <S%H935>bringing.<s%>
For the <S%H4399>stuff<s%> they had was <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3498>it,<s%> and too much.

All the <S%H2450>wise-hearted<s%> <S%H3820>men<s%> among those who <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains;<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H6213>workman,<s%> they made them.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%> All the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

He <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>another,<s%> and the other <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> he <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> from the <S%H7098>edge<s%> in the <S%H4225>coupling.<s%> Likewise he <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>coupling.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain,<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>coupling.<s%> The <S%H3924>loops<s%> were <S%H6901>opposite<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H2266>coupled<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> with the <S%H7165>clasps:<s%> so the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was a <S%H259>unit.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair for a <S%H168>covering<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain.<s%> The <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>
He <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H8337>themselves,<s%> and six curtains by <S%H3407>themselves.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H4225>coupling,<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> which was outmost in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2279>coupling.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> to <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H2266>together,<s%> that it might be a <S%H259>unit.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of sea <S%H8476>cow<s%> <S%H5785>hides<s%> <S%H4605>above.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> standing <S%H5975>up.<s%>

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H7175>board,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>

<S%H259>Each<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons,<s%> <S%H7947>joined<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H259>another.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> all the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the tabernacle this <S%H4908>way.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> under the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons.<s%>
For the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%>

and their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board.<s%>
For the far <S%H3411>part<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4742>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in the far <S%H3411>part.<s%>

They were <S%H8382>double<s%> <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> and in the <S%H8382>same<s%> <S%H3162>way<s%> they were all the way to its <S%H7218>top<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2885>ring.<s%> He <S%H6213>did<s%> this to <S%H8147>both<s%> of them in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4740>corners.<s%>

There were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H134>sockets;<s%> under <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood;<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%>

and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> for the hinder <S%H3411>part<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> to <S%H1272>pass<s%> <S%H8432>through<s%> in the midst of the <S%H7175>boards<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> to the <S%H7097>other.<s%>

He <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen:<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> it the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a skillful <S%H2803>workman.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> for <S%H6823>it,<s%> and overlaid them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%> Their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> were of <S%H2091>gold.<s%> He <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of silver for <S%H3701>them.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> the work of an <S%H7551>embroiderer;<s%>

and the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of it with their <S%H2053>hooks.<s%> He <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> their <S%H7218>capitals<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and their <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> were of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>
